job.skills: Single-page app, Javascript, Vue.js, XML, HTML, CSS, GITHUB (PHP planned)
job.details:
Dynamically generated resume XML, VUE.js, Javascript, HTML, CSS
  • Allow users to alter resume focus by altering the URL variable “?res=”
    • Options include
      • dev – Developer focused
      • support – Support focused
      • short – Condensed
      • expand – Detailed
      • base – Overall focused
  • Single-page application is built on Vue.js wrapped in HTML
  • Data is stored/retrieved from an XML file
  • GITHub repository: https://github.com/GBGastelum/VueResume
  • Next functionality expansion will be PHP-based XML editing page
    • New page will allow convenient updating of XML data used for resume

job.roles: Application Engineer, Technical Writer, Trainer, Team Leader
job.skills: Linux, Scripting, JAVA, SQL, Team Player, Multi-environment troubleshooting
job.details:
• Monitoring and troubleshooting applications across multiple independent environments involving:
    • Varied data flow paths between each environment
    • Multiple monitoring methods, including Nimsoft, Kibana, Linux, and other teams
    • Analyzing logs and behavior in one environment to troubleshoot an issue in another environment
  • Documentation creation, correction, and dissemination, which required:
    • Following up with the appropriate SMEs to correct/update the document when an error was discovered
    • Increasing documentation visibility by adding tags and/or moving it to a more relevant location
    • Working with SMEs and users to create new documentation that is easy to use and understand
  • Constantly learning new applications, workflows, communication methods, and cross-team knowledge sharing
  • Consistent evaluation of current processes to identify areas and methods to improve efficiency and efficacy
  • Work with a variety of teammates and other technical teams effectively and professionally
    • Create strong team communication and support to:
      • Minimize unnecessary turnover and subsequent retraining
      • Ensure effective troubleshooting and operational awareness through communication and trust
    • Be proactive in connecting newer team members to SMEs to build knowledge and confidence

Technical Services Operations Center (TSOC) Application Engineer
  • Monitoring and troubleshooting application across multiple independent environments
  • Documentation
  • Process Improvement
  • Constant Learning

Technical Services Operations Center (TSOC) Application Engineer
  • Monitoring and troubleshooting applications across multiple independent environments involving:
    • Varied data flow paths between each environment
    • Multiple monitoring methods, including Nimsoft, Kibana, Linux, and other teams
    • Analyzing logs and behavior in one environment to troubleshoot an issue in another environment
  • Documentation creation, correction, and dissemination, which required:
    • Effectively searching within multiple documentation repositories
      • Sharepoint, Wiki, Sharefile, emails, past tickets
    • Following up with the appropriate SMEs to correct/update the document when an error was discovered
    • Increasing documentation visibility by adding tags and/or moving it to a more relevant location
    • Working with SMEs and users to create new documentation that is easy to use and understand
  • Constant Learning new applications, workflows, communication methods, and cross-team knowledge sharing
    • Regularly work with other shifts to ensure knowledge and familiarity dissemination
    • Consistently provide off-hours support to less familiar teams across the TSOC family
  • Consistent evaluation of current processes to identify areas and methods to improve efficiency and efficacy
    • When a process is improved, work with all TSOC shifts to ensure improvement is applicable to all teams
  • Work with a variety of teammates and other technical teams effectively and professionally
    • Create strong team communication and support to:
      • Minimize unnecessary turnover and subsequent retraining
      • Ensure effective troubleshooting and operational awareness through communication and trust
    • Be proactive in connecting newer team members to SMEs to build knowledge and confidence
    • Reach out to other teams to discuss schedules and plans to ensure operational awareness

job.roles: Project Manager, Lead Programmer, Database Administrator, Support and Feedback Manager
job.skills: PHP, MySQL, Research and development, Testing, Client interaction & follow up, Leadership
job.details:
Project Leader Agile, SCRUM
  • Meet with stakeholders and end users regularly to provide updates and receive feedback
  • Prioritize new features based on meetings, value, and time to implement
Lead Programmer PHP 5, HTML, XML, Excel - Quality Control, Technical Writer
  • Transition high level design details into lower level design specifications
  • Consistently implement testing and documentation practices throughout development process
  • When creating or expanding GUIs
    • Ensure existing documentation is updated
    • Create new documentation with similar formatting as existing documents
    • Meet with end users regularly to gain feedback regarding ease of usability
Database Administrator MySQL, PHP 5, SQL - Design, Implementation, Maintenance
  • Utilize requirements from SCRUM and design specifications to design databases for multiple applications to share
  • Follow Database Normalization practices to ensure stability, usability, and scalability
  • Keep formatting consistent to allow cross-application data sharing to provide additional value
Support and Feedback Manager MySQL, PHP 5, SQL, logging - On-Call Support
  • Give courteous and focused support, and always follow up to ensure resolution
  • Document any support calls to review them in future planning meetings
    • Identify trends or repeated issue areas

Project Leader Agile, SCRUM
Lead Programmer PHP 5, HTML, XML, Excel - Quality Control, Technical Writer
  • Transition high level design details into lower level design specifications
Database Administrator MySQL, PHP 5, SQL - Design, Implementation, Maintenance
Support and Feedback Manager MySQL, PHP 5, SQL, logging - On-Call Support
  • Internal and External customers

Project Leader Agile, SCRUM
  • Meet with stakeholders and end users regularly to provide updates and receive feedback
  • Prioritize new features based on meetings, value, and time to implement
Lead Programmer PHP 5, HTML, XML, Excel - Quality Control, Technical Writer
  • Transition high level design details into lower level design specifications
  • Consistently implement testing and documentation practices throughout development process
  • When creating or expanding GUIs
    • Ensure existing documentation is updated
    • Create new documentation with similar formatting as existing documents
    • Meet with end users regularly to gain feedback regarding user manual ease of usability
Database Administrator MySQL, PHP 5, SQL - Design, Implementation, Maintenance
  • Utilize requirements from SCRUM and design specifications to design databases for multiple applications to share
  • Follow Database Normalization practices to ensure stability and usability
  • Ensure Database is scalable based on multiple application needs
  • Keep formatting consistent to allow cross-application data sharing to provide additional value
  • Monitor database size and traffic to evaluate status and plan for future growth
Support and Feedback Manager MySQL, PHP 5, SQL, logging - On-Call Support
  • Provide reliable contact information for internal and external customers
  • Give courteous and focused support, and always follow up to ensure resolution
  • Document any support calls to review them in future planning meetings
    • Identify trends or repeated subjects of support calls
    • Work with relevant vendors, when applicable, to eliminate or lessen areas of concern

job.roles: JAVA Developer, Technical Writer, Quality Control
job.skills: JAVA, Spring Web Flow, XHTML, HTML, Oracle, SQL
job.details:
Java Developer JAVA, Spring Web Flow, XHTML, HTML, Oracle 11g, SQL, SVN - SCRUM
  • Evaluate and implement feature requests from end users
    • Professionally communicate with requester when clarification is needed
    • Identify and resolve any potential conflict between new feature and current user stories
    • Implement feature within local test environment
      • Test new feature and existing functionality thoroughly
      • Update existing testing procedures to handle new feature
    • Once tested locally, SVN commit new feature to shared test environment
      • Repeat test for new feature and existing functionality
      • Verify new testing procedures perform correctly in shared test environment
      • Ensure functionality of any recent committed changes from other team members
    • Once tested on shared test environment, disseminate updated/new documentation
Documentation, Quality Control
  • Create QC testing protocols
    • Work with senior team members and available end users to identify key user stories
    • Create testing protocols to ensure application functionality
    • Disseminate testing protocols to team members
  • Consistently revisit testing protocols
    • Identify and incorporate any new user stories
    • Expand documentation to incorporate new features

Java Developer JAVA, Spring Web Flow, XHTML, HTML, Oracle 11g, SQL, SVN - SCRUM
  • Evaluate and implement feature requests
Technical Writer, Quality Control
  • Creating and Updating QC testing protocols

  • Consistently revisit testing protocols

    • Regularly communicate with team members to identify new testing needs
    • Expand documentation to incorporate new features
    • Disseminate new testing protocols to team members

job.roles: WCM Technical Specialist, Portal Installation & Cluster Specialist, Critical Support Coordinator
job.skills: Customer interaction, Error resolution, JAVA, DB, SQL, Team Player
job.details:
WCM Technical Specialist JAVA, System logging, SQL/Database
  • Troubleshoot problem tickets from clients with varying business needs, uses, and setups
  • Coordinate troubleshooting with multiple teams across the globe to assist/get assistance with complicated issues
  • On-call rotation, including backup on-call rotation
Portal Installation and Clustering Specialist JAVA, install/setup, Logging, SQL/Database, OS configuration
  • Communicate with clients to understand their business needs and current hardware and network setup
  • Create test environments to attempt issue replication and local troubleshooting
  • Provide a solution to the client that accomplishes their needs within their available resources

WCM Technical Specialist JAVA, System logging, SQL/Database
Portal Installation and Clustering Specialist JAVA, install/setup, Logging, SQL/Database, OS configuration
Critical Support Coordinator
  • Coordinate troubleshooting with multiple teams across the globe

WCM Technical Specialist JAVA, System logging, SQL/Database
  • Familiarize myself with WCM suite
  • Accept problem tickets from clients with varying business needs, uses, and setups
  • Coordinate troubleshooting with multiple teams across the globe
    • Coordination needs including hours of operation and SME knowledge
  • On-call rotation, including backup on-call rotation
  • Work with team members to assist and get assistance with complicated issues
Portal Installation and Clustering Specialist JAVA, install/setup, Logging, SQL/Database, OS configuration
  • Communicate with clients to understand their business needs and current hardware and network setup
  • Create test environments to attempt issue replication and local troubleshooting
  • Provide a solution to the client that accomplishes their needs within their available resources
Critical Support Coordinator
  • Coordinate troubleshooting with multiple teams across the globe
    • Ensure new resolution steps/methods are disseminated to the entire IBM family and clients
    • Accommodate employee’s schedules from regions and cultures across the globe
